do you want to be my sponsor? I don't think I really need the meetings.

translation.en: -No. Neither do I. -But maybe we can
translation.fr: Moi non plus. On pourrait passer du temps ensemble,ce serait pareil.

translation.en: hang out and that would be the same thing?
translation.fr: On pourrait passer du temps ensemble,ce serait pareil.

translation.en: Yeah. Anytime. Night or day.
translation.fr: Quand tu veux. Nuit et jour.

translation.en: And remember, throw your past in the bin and just... -[both] Stay busy. -[laughing]
translation.fr: - Jette ton passé, reste occupée.- Reste occupée.

translation.en: [George] Wait, what do you mean you're not going back?
translation.fr: Comment ça, tu n'y retournes pas ?

translation.en: I'm just not going back.
-They only had eggs. It was bullshit. -Oh.
translation.fr: Ils n'avaient que des œufs.N'importe quoi.

translation.en: Oh, wow. Yeah. That's so cool.
You're such a rebel. Mae, you're like James Dean.
translation.fr: Quelle rebelle. Tu es comme James Dean.

translation.en: Okay, but check it out. I got a sponsor.
translation.fr: Mais tu sais quoi ? J'ai une marraine.

translation.en: I met this weird woman and she said I just need to stay busy instead.
translation.fr: J'ai rencontré une nana bizarre qui a ditque je devais m'occuper.

translation.en: Wait.
Do you actually think I look like James Dean?
translation.fr: Tu trouves que je ressemble à James Dean ?

translation.en: Isn't the first rule of these meetings accepting that you have a problem?
translation.fr: La 1re règle de ces réunions n'est pasde reconnaître qu'on a un problème ?

translation.en: I had a problem and now I have you.
translation.fr: J'avais un problème et maintenant, je t'ai.

translation.en: You can't just have me. Okay? I don't just have you.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas avoir que moi. OK ? Je n'ai pas que toi.

translation.en: I have work and I have my friends and I...
translation.fr: J'ai un boulot, mes amis, et...

translation.en: -Yeah. -[George] What?
What is that?
[exhales sharply] All right.
How come I've never met any of your friends?
translation.fr: Pourquoi je n'ai pas rencontré tes amis ?

translation.en: She makes a good point.
I'm sorry, can we not have this conversation in front of Phil, please?
translation.fr: Pardon,on peut ne pas parler devant Phil ?

translation.en: I'm going to introduce you when I'm ready.
translation.fr: Je te présenterai quand je serai prête.

translation.en: Okay? But this conversation is about you, actually.
translation.fr: OK ? Mais on parlait de toi.

translation.en: Well, maybe I didn't tell you about it 'cause I didn't think you'd get it.
translation.fr: Peut-être que je n'ai rien ditcar tu ne peux pas comprendre.

translation.en: We've had very different lives,
translation.fr: On a eu des vies différentes,

translation.en: and you grew up, like, in a bag of feathers.
translation.fr: et tu as grandi dans un sac de plumes.

translation.en: Oxford, actually. I grew up in Oxford. You ever heard of it?
translation.fr: À Oxford. J'ai grandi à Oxford.Tu connais ?

translation.en: Maybe I'd get it if you explained it, but you don't, okay? So I have to,
translation.fr: Je pourrais comprendre si tu m'expliquais.Mais, du coup,

translation.en: like, root around in all of your stuff.
translation.fr: je dois fouiller dans tes affaires.

translation.en: -You went through my stuff? -Yes!
It says here
that you wrote this in hospital.
translation.fr: que tu as écrit ça à l'hôpital.

translation.en: And that you owe someone called "Ink Boy" $800.
translation.fr: Et que tu dois 800 $ à un certain Ink-boy.

translation.en: Oh, and what is this? Is this, like, a drugs hat?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que c'est ?C'est un chapeau de droguée ?

translation.en: Mae, where are you going?
translation.fr: Mae, où est-ce que tu vas ?

translation.en: Oh, my God.
I don't...
What the fuck was that?
New me.
New life.
I have everything under control.
Said every junkie ever.
God, why do you have to be so intense?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu dois être si dramatique ?

translation.en: I am not...
intense.
I'm sorry.
So I'm jizzing, and I'm jizzing, and I'm jizzing.
translation.fr: Je suis en train de me vider les couilles.

translation.en: I'm jizzing like a goddamn machine gun.
-Jizz, jizz, jizz! -[audience laughing]
Why did you book this terrible man?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu as engagé ce type atroce ?

translation.en: That's Pete.
People love Pete.
If they like him, they are not gonna like me.
translation.fr: S'ils l'aiment, ils ne m'aimeront pas.

translation.en: Ah, well, you'd be surprised. People are mad.
translation.fr: Tu serais étonnée. Les gens sont dingues.

translation.en: Yeah. Okay.
[Nick] You're up next.
Where you been in my life, baby?
translation.fr: Où tu étais passée, ma belle ?

translation.en: What is this?
-Do you like it? It's my new gimmick. -[audience cheering]
translation.fr: Tu aimes ? C'est mon nouveau truc.

translation.en: [Pete] Fuck yeah! I'm a fucking king! Whoo!
Who's this guy?
So Monday, Wednesday, Friday, I bring in my packed lunch.
-I have my usual, which is... -Ham.
translation.fr: - Toujours la même chose.- Du jambon.

translation.en: Ham. Then Tuesday, Thursday, I go into the cafeteria.
translation.fr: Jambon. Puis mardi, jeudi,je vais à la cafétéria.

translation.en: What do you think they're serving on both days
translation.fr: À ton avis, que servent-ils ces jours-là ?

translation.en: this particular week?
-Ham? -[laughing] Ham!
So that's Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday.
Ham, ham, ham, ham, ham!
I'm seeing someone. Sorry.
Okay.
Well, I feel like a regular old ham head.
What's his name?
Um, Jonathan Crenshaw.
-Jonathan Crenshaw. -Yeah.
Well, you know. When the cat's away,
translation.fr: Tu sais. Quand le chat est parti,

translation.en: the mice hit the town and... I don't remember the exact saying, but--
translation.fr: les souris sortent...J'ai oublié le dicton.

translation.en: -[new song starts] -Oh shit! This is me!
♪ One can have a dream, baby ♪
♪ Two can make that dream so true ♪
translation.fr: À deux, on peut réaliser ce rêve

translation.en: Fuck off, Jared!
♪ One can talk about being in love ♪
♪ Two can see how it really feels ♪
translation.fr: À deux, on peut le ressentir

translation.en: What do you wanna know?
Everything.
I got addicted to coke when I was a kid and my parents kicked me out.
translation.fr: Je suis devenue accro à la cokequand j'étais ado et mes parents m'ont virée.

translation.en: I sold drugs, I overdosed, I went to jail.
translation.fr: J'ai été dealer, j'ai fait une overdose,je suis allée en prison.

translation.en: I just really,
really want it to be over.
-Really? -Yeah.
Is there anything else we need to talk about?
Like... did you wanna tell me about your friends and why--
translation.fr: De tes amis et de la raison...

translation.en: Why don't you just go down on me?
Okay, that sounds good. Yeah.
